message: Let's be realistic. The longer this takes, the less we both get.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
Don't think I'll give up that easily
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Take the deal before inflation eats up your share even more.
I'd rather lose more to inflation than give you that much
Alice, you're hurting yourself more than me.  Let's be sensible and end this.
